title: Dialma Balsegia
text:
Dialma Balsegia (born March 11, 1900, date of death unknown) was a Swiss skeleton racer who competed in the late 1940s. He finished 12th in the skeleton event at the 1948 Winter Olympics in St. Moritz.


== References ==
